column5: Hey Everyone, I am trying to help promote a perch derby at the Hamilton Bay and I just thought I would let you all know about it.  Thanks for your time  http://www.billsbaitandtackle.ca/modules.p...topic&t=886
Hey Greg, Just becoming a member now? What took you so long.  Mark

Hey Greg, like I said yesterday, as of right now I can't make it, but if plans change I'll be there. I'll see you next weekend I'll probably take the keepnet and more floats. BTW, love the reels I bought yesterday. Thanks
took a while eh   , long time lerker lol......thanks guys, i'll have to put some reports up if we catch any fish this weekend.
Mark you hitting up Dunceville tomorrow?
Hey Gerritt, Heading to the cottage tomorrow. Hoping to sneak in one last ice fishing adventure. I think I am going to head down to the perch derby though. May see you there. Did you move?
Yeah brother... renting my old house out now.. I am living in Caledonia now.. on River Rd... lets hook up some time for a fish man...  Greg, good to see you posting man  G
